pageContext.claim: “I'm going to do a big executive order. I have the power to do it as president, and I'm going to make DACA a part of it. But, we put it in, and we'll probably going to then be taking it out. We're working out the legal complexities right now, but I'm going to be signing a very major immigration bill as an executive order, which the Supreme Court now, because of the DACA decision, has given me the power to do that.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump consistently promises executive orders for problems that require new laws, and then often does not follow through.
